lines.text: . And you're a hell of alot shorter than Gary Cooper.
You've come a long way, George. Time was you couldn't even undo a bra,now you've gone straight through to the spleen without even askin'.
You know about islands on the other side of the world, stars and reflex...
Whatever. All this stuff no one 'round here's ever heard of. But you're livin' on a busted boat that fell off a truck, and you're working on a road gang. You can do anything you set your mind to.

[Victoria's on the verge of tears]
Aww... it's the most beautiful field I have ever seen.
Don't bother getting up, this'll be real quick.
Now we're even, almost! You ever lay a hand on me again I'll come after you with a gun and what's hurting you now won't even be there than!
